# action

**Instance Property**

The command alternative’s action-method selector.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var action: Selector { get }
```

## Getting information about the alternative

- **title**: The command alternative’s title.
- **modifierFlags**: The bit mask of modifier keys that the user must press to invoke the action for the alternative command.

items.description: The bit mask of modifier keys that the user must press to invoke the action for the alternative command.
